Package battlesys.exception

Exception Summary
BadMoveFileException Thrown when the move file is bad e.g. do not have valid constructor
BadMoveSettingFileException Thrown when the move setting file is bad i.e. does not contain data for every move
BadPlayerFileException Thrown when the player file is bad e.g. do not have valid constructor
BadRandomEventFileException Thrown when the random event setting file is bad
BattleSysException Exception designed for BattleSys.
BattleSysRuntimeException  
BattleTooLongException Thrown when the battle becomes too long.
InvalidMoveNameException Excption thrown when the move name is invalid.
MoveNotBoughtException Excption thrown when the player did not buy a certain move.
NotEnoughPointsException Excption thrown when the player do not have enough points
UnbuyableMoveException Excption thrown when the move is not buyable
